root.name: Painkiller Hell & Damnation
root.description: OverviewPainkiller: Hell and Damnation is an 'HD' remake of the original Painkiller and Painkiller: Battle out of Hell. The remake was announced during E3 2012 and was released on PC via Steam on October 31st, 2012. Console versions are due in Summer 2013.The game features a selection of 14 levels from the original Painkiller and Battle out of Hell expansion out of a total of the 34 levels.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista/7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceSound: DirectX CompatibleRecommendedOS: Windows Vista/7Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core processorMemory: 3 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GTX/ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512+ MB)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 5 GB HD spaceSound: DirectX Compatible
